means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 希普曼职业名称，牧羊人，来源于古英语，含义是“羊+人”(sheep+man)
[人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 希普曼职业名称，水手，来源于古英语，含义是“船+人”(ship+man)
[地名] [加拿大、美国] 希普曼

sentence.Network_en: Shipman had seen her alone in her room for a short time.
sentence.Network_cn: 船长在她的房间里和她单独会面了一会儿.

sentence.Network_en: Shipman firmly refused to plead guilty. His motives remain a mystery.
sentence.Network_cn: 希普曼坚不认罪, 他的动机依然成谜.

sentence.Network_en: Shipman came downstairs and called to her that he would see her out.
sentence.Network_cn: 船长走下楼梯,向她大声说,他可以送她出去.
